summary: Completed frontend testing of pre-launch checklist items. All 6 legal/info pages (Privacy, Terms, Disclaimer, Trust, Contact, FAQ) are working correctly. Google Analytics integration verified. Sitemap.xml and robots.txt are accessible. Footer shows affiliate disclosure and all legal links.
passed_tests: Privacy Policy page loads at /privacy with all required sections
Terms of Service page loads at /terms with all required sections
Disclaimer page loads at /disclaimer with all required sections
Trust & Transparency page loads at /trust with all required sections
Contact page loads at /contact with support@veriqo.com email
FAQ page loads at /faq with searchable questions and category tabs
Footer has links to all legal pages (Privacy, Terms, Disclaimer, FAQ, Trust, Contact)
Google Analytics script present in page source (G-518729566)
Sitemap.xml accessible at /sitemap.xml with all pages listed
Robots.txt accessible at /robots.txt with proper disallow rules for private pages
critical_code_review_comments: All legal pages have consistent design and proper content
Google Analytics ID format is G-518729566 which is correct GA4 format
Sitemap.xml uses production domain (veriqo.com) - this is correct for SEO
Robots.txt properly disallows authenticated pages from indexing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pre-launch checklist items are complete. All 6 legal/info pages created and working: Privacy (/privacy), Terms (/terms), Disclaimer (/disclaimer), Trust (/trust), Contact (/contact), FAQ (/faq). Google Analytics (G-518729566) integrated. Sitemap.xml and robots.txt created. Footer updated with affiliate disclosure and all legal links.
